meanings.sent1: The multitracked song had a rich and layered sound.
meanings.sent2: The band's multitracked vocals created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent3: The multitracked music made it seem like there were many musicians playing at once.
meanings.sent4: Her multitracked voice echoed through the room, filling every corner.
meanings.sent5: The multitracked recording captured every detail of the performance.

meanings.definition: To record on multiple tracks simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The studio multitracked the vocals for the new album.
meanings.sent2: She multitracked the instruments to achieve a fuller sound.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally multitracked my voice with the background noise, creating a funny effect.
meanings.sent4: The engineer multitracked the audio, blending different elements seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: They multitracked the entire concert, ensuring nothing was missed in the recording process.
